speaker: cat
dialog: whoa, this definitely isn’t the beach! WHERE THE H*LL AM I???

speaker: cat
dialog: Huh, it weirdly smells like tomato sauce and anchovies. A hint of mushroom in there too. And cheese…?

speaker: cat
dialog: haha, what’s that one round, dough-based food with tomato sauce and cheese and all these toppings called again…?

speaker: cat
